Package playn.core

Interface Summary
AbstractLayer.Interaction<L> Used to dispatch pointer/touch/mouse events to layers.
Analytics  
Assets Fetches and returns assets.
AssetWatcher.Listener Listener interface for AssetWatcher.
Audio  
Canvas A 2d drawing canvas.
CanvasImage An image that can provide a Canvas that allows you to draw directly into the image.
CanvasLayer TODO
Connection Represents a listener registration and allows unregistration.
Events.Input The base for all input events.
Events.Position The base for all events with pointer position.
Font Contains metadata for a font.
Game Main game interface.
Gradient A gradient fill pattern created by Graphics.createLinearGradient(float, float, float, float, int[], float[]) or Graphics.createRadialGradient(float, float, float, int[], float[]) .
Graphics Main 2D graphics interface.
GroupLayer GroupLayer creates a Layer hierarchy by maintaining an ordered group of child Layers.
Image An image.
Image.Region A subregion of an image.
ImageLayer TODO
ImmediateLayer Represents a layer that enables direct rendering into the framebuffer.
ImmediateLayer.Clipped An immediate layer that is clipped to a specified bounds.
ImmediateLayer.Renderer Defines a callback that is invoked every frame to render an immediate layer.
InternalTransform Exposes internals of our transform to the graphics backends.
Json PlayN JSON parsing and serialization interface.
Json.Array Represents a parsed JSON array as a simple int->value map.
Json.Object Represents a parsed JSON object as a simple string->value map.
Json.TypedArray<T> A JSON array that assumes all values are of a uniform JSON type.
Json.Writer A JsonSink that writes JSON to a string.
Keyboard Input-device interface for keyboard events.
Keyboard.Event An event dispatched when a key is pressed or released.
Keyboard.Listener  
Keyboard.TypedEvent An event dispatched when a printable character is typed.
Layer Layer is the base element for all rendering in PlayN
Layer.HasSize Interface for Layers containing explicit sizes.
Layer.HitTester Used to customize a layer's hit testing mechanism.
Log Simple PlayN logging interface.
Mouse Input-device interface for mouse events.
Mouse.ButtonEvent An event dispatched when a button is pressed.
Mouse.Listener  
Mouse.MotionEvent An event dispatched when the mouse is moved.
Mouse.WheelEvent An event dispatched when the mouse wheel is scrolled.
Net PlayN network interface.
ParentLayer Provides some implementation details needed by Layer.
Path A path object created by Canvas.createPath().
Pattern A bitmap fill pattern created by Graphics.createPattern(Image).
Platform Generic platform interface.
Pointer Input-device interface for pointer events.
Pointer.Event The event dispatched to pointer listeners.
Pointer.Listener  
RegularExpression TODO: flush out.
ResourceCallback<T> Callback interface used to notify completion or failure of a resource request.
Sound A sound.
Storage Storage interface.
Surface TODO
SurfaceLayer TODO
TextLayout Contains metrics and metadata for a laid out body of text.
Touch Input-device interface for touch and multi-touch events if they are supported.
Touch.Event An event dispatched to report touch information.
Touch.Listener  
 

Class Summary
AbstractAssets  
AbstractCachingAssets  
AbstractFont Base Font implementation shared among platforms.
AbstractLayer Base Layer implementation shared among platforms (to avoid reinventing the transform logic).
AbstractLayer.Interactor<L>  
AbstractSound  
Analytics.AnalyticsImpl  
Analytics.Category  
Asserts Simple static methods to be called at the start of your own methods to verify correct arguments and state.
AssetWatcher A utility class that helps keep track of image loading.
CanvasSurface Implementation class, to be used by platforms that implement Surface as just a special case of Canvas.
Color Utility methods for working with packed-integer colors.
Events Defines some shared events.
Events.Input.Impl  
Events.Position.Impl  
GroupLayerImpl<L extends AbstractLayer> Provides implementations for per-platform concrete GroupLayers.
Keyboard.Adapter A Keyboard.Listener implementation with NOOP stubs provided for each method.
Keyboard.Event.Impl  
Keyboard.TypedEvent.Impl  
Layer.Util Utility class for transforming coordinates between Layers.
Mouse.Adapter A Mouse.Listener implementation with NOOP stubs provided for each method.
Mouse.ButtonEvent.Impl  
Mouse.MotionEvent.Impl  
Mouse.WheelEvent.Impl  
MouseImpl Handles the common logic for all platform Mouse implementations.
PlayN The main PlayN interface.
Pointer.Adapter A Pointer.Listener implementation with NOOP stubs provided for each method.
Pointer.Event.Impl  
PointerImpl Handles the common logic for all platform Pointer implementations.
StockInternalTransform The default InternalTransform instance, used on non-JavaScript platforms.
TextFormat Contains configuration for laying out and drawing single- or multi-line text to a Canvas.
TextFormat.Effect Used to model the different text effects: shadow and outline.
TextFormat.Effect.Outline Contains metadata for the outline effect.
TextFormat.Effect.Shadow Contains metadata for the shadow effect.
Touch.Adapter A Touch.Listener implementation with NOOP stubs provided for each method.
Touch.Event.Impl  
 

Enum Summary
AbstractLayer.Flag  
Canvas.Composite Values that may be used with Canvas.setCompositeOperation(Composite).
Canvas.LineCap Values that may be used with Canvas.setLineCap(LineCap).
Canvas.LineJoin Values that may be used with Canvas.setLineJoin(LineJoin).
Font.Style The styles that may be requested for a given font.
Key Enumerates all possible keys that may be encountered on all platforms.
Keyboard.TextType Enumerates the different mobile keyboard types that can be requested.
Platform.Type  
TextFormat.Alignment Used to align multiline text.
